```
static var automatic: CompactPickerSubscriptionStoreControlStyle.Placement { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/storekit/compactpickersubscriptionstorecontrolstyle/placement/automatic#see-also)

### [Getting a placement](/documentation/storekit/compactpickersubscriptionstorecontrolstyle/placement/automatic#Getting-a-placement)

[`static var bottomBar: CompactPickerSubscriptionStoreControlStyle.Placement`](/documentation/storekit/compactpickersubscriptionstorecontrolstyle/placement/bottombar)A placement that locates the compact picker in a bar near the bottom of the main scroll view in a subscription store view.[`static var buttonsInBottomBar: CompactPickerSubscriptionStoreControlStyle.Placement`](/documentation/storekit/compactpickersubscriptionstorecontrolstyle/placement/buttonsinbottombar)A hybrid placement that positions subscription controls within the main scroll view, and places auxiliary buttons in the bottom bar.[`static var scrollView: CompactPickerSubscriptionStoreControlStyle.Placement`](/documentation/storekit/compactpickersubscriptionstorecontrolstyle/placement/scrollview)
